page.title: 08TOURISM
page.content: In the eastern part of our area there are many signs that we live in a tourist area.Many of the terrace houses are used as guest houses and bed and breakfast homes.One of the main signs of tourism is the number of parked cars.People try to avoid paying for car parks.People can be seen walking in the streets in holiday clothes.Shops have started selling buckets and spades,rubber rings and other beach equipment hang outside the small general stores.In our school we have 300 families.25% have parents working directly in the tourist trade. And 23% open their homes to holidaymakers.
